reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress flattering, with one noting how it accentuates a slim figure, and appreciate its feminine style and comfort.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well made.
items.body: Loved this dress. I used it for our family portraits & it turned out great! It was well made, thick material. There’s a slip underneath so it isn’t see through. It hugs your body nicely in the mid section and then drapes off into the skirt. Also, the bottom is cut perfectly. You can see in the photo it’s straight across and not draping around. Very cute! Read more
items.author: Sarah Govea

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy in all of your favorite colors!
items.body: I bought this as a go to for religious meetings activities and love it! I pair it with heels and sometimes a belt and jacket and/or a chunky necklace. I purchased Navy. Fabric is soft, super Stretchy and resilient. I receive a lots of compliments on it. The skirt has a nice flowy movement to it that’s very feminine. I will buy this in more colors. Pullover style. Also, I’m a bit over my preferred weight and size and Medium still fits very comfortably. (I usually wear a size medium) 5’7” 165kbs 34DD 31” waist Read more
items.author: GoldenChihuaha

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Dress for Any Time of the Year
items.body: This is a year around dress, not just for summer. And it can be dressed up or down! I always get compliments when I wear it to work. High stretch and great material so if you are in between sizes just go down one. I am 5’7 and 140ish lbs and the small is perfect. Read more
items.author: tayler_aich

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars 7/10
items.body: 7/10 this dress is just too long! I love the style and the color! I’m 5’2 and this dress hits the floor! It was so difficult to walk in and kept getting trapped between my legs. The fit it’s super flattering but I layered to help with that and the lack of sleeves. If the dress wasn’t so long and perhaps flared a bit more rather than pleated it would’ve been perfect, and maybe a big of a sleeve. Read more
items.author: HollandLocal01

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable
items.body: Great material and very flattering. Didn’t end up keeping it because it wasn’t fancy enough for my event. Tshirt type material but great for summer Read more
items.author: Holly F

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and Comfortable dress
items.body: Pretty Garden is my go to on Amazon for a lot of dresses and jump suits. This dress is so pretty and has pockets--a must for me. I love the color, the style, the quality of the material, the fit and the fabric. I usually am apprehensive about form fitting tops with stretch as this dress is, because of my full breast. Snug fitting stretchy tops can make for a "uniboob" and I hate that. This does not do that. I love the feel of the fabric and the flow of the skirt. It does not have a lining, but it was fine with this dress. The weight of it is comfortable and flattering as one walks. Nice color, but it comes in severe other colors. Pick the one that flatters you most. Hope you like it, too Read more
items.author: Wifesk1

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!
items.body: I received the dress today and am so happy! It's a gorgeous deep burgundy, made from heavy material that isn't sheer. The ruched waist is so slimming as well as pretty. I got an XXL since I'm chest, the dress fits loosely and is very comfortable. I wish it was a midi since I'm not tall, but that's am easy fix. I plan on getting another one in a different color. Read more
items.author: T Coleman

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Coffee, Burgundy, Dark Grey, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Navy, Khaki, Pink, Bean Green, Beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
